update scale_urine_flow_rate
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scale_title = #{scaleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scale_score = #{scaleScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scale_type = #{scaleType,jdbcType=CHAR},

mapper.sql: parentScaleUrineFlowRate.id parentScaleUrineFlowRateId, parentScaleUrineFlowRate.scale_title parentScaleUrineFlowRateScaleTitle, parentScaleUrineFlowRate.scale_score parentScaleUrineFlowRateScaleScore,parentScaleUrineFlowRate.scale_type parentScaleUrineFlowRateScaleType, childScaleUrineFlowRate.id childScaleUrineFlowRateId, childScaleUrineFlowRate.scale_title childScaleUrineFlowRateScaleTitle, childScaleUrineFlowRate.scale_score childScaleUrineFlowRateScaleScore,childScaleUrineFlowRate.scale_type childScaleUrineFlowRateScaleType
LEFT JOIN scale_urine_flow_rate childScaleUrineFlowRate ON childScaleUrineFlowRate.parent_id = parentScaleUrineFlowRate.id
mapper.select:
select
from scale_urine_flow_rate parentScaleUrineFlowRate
parentScaleUrineFlowRate.del_flag = 0 AND parentScaleUrineFlowRate.parent_id is null AND childScaleUrineFlowRate.parent_id is not null
GROUP BY childScaleUrineFlowRate.id ORDER BY parentScaleUrineFlowRate.scale_weight ASC,childScaleUrineFlowRate.scale_weight ASC
